metadata.name: Noob 365 GMs - A journey (2021-2022)
metadata.description:
This artwork is a memento journaling blocknoob's journey of showcasing 1 artwork a day from his collection in a chain of quote tweets from September 18th, 2021, through September 17th, 2022.

The idea had some inspiration from daily/regular GMs by other collectors but chaining it was a unique way to look back. This was hard-forked multiple times.

gm is culture, anon.

Technicalities 
The initial few images within the video & thumbnail are created by me x DALL-E by Open AI around the theme of gold & black (colors largely inspired by my profile picture that everyone is familiar with). Rest of it is all the gm's shared on twitter attributing artists.
